Sql.query: delete from iio_factura where psiclicodi = :psiclicodi and emprcodi = :emprcodi

insert into iio_factura( psiclicodi, ufacmesfacturado, ufaccodbrg, ufaccodpuntosuministro, ufacidareademanda, ufacpagavad, ufacprecenergbrghp, ufacprecenergbrgfp, ufacprecpotenbrg, ufacconsenergactvhpps, ufacconsenergactvfpps, ufacmaxdemhpps, ufacmaxdemfpps, ufacpeajetransmprin, ufacpeajetransmsec, ufacfpmpoten, ufacfpmenerg, ufacfactgeneracion, ufacfacttransmprin, ufacfacttransmsec, ufacfactdistrib, ufacfactexcesopoten, ufacfacturaciontotal, ufacconsenergreacps, ufacppmt, ufacpemt, ufacfactptoref, ufacvadhp, ufacvadfp, ufaccargoelectrificacionrural, ufacotrosconceptosnoafectoigv, ufacotrosconceptosafectoigv, emprcodi, equicodi ) values ( :psiclicodi, :ufacmesfacturado, :ufaccodbrg, :ufaccodpuntosuministro, :ufacidareademanda, :ufacpagavad, :ufacprecenergbrghp, :ufacprecenergbrgfp, :ufacprecpotenbrg, :ufacconsenergactvhpps, :ufacconsenergactvfpps, :ufacmaxdemhpps, :ufacmaxdemfpps, :ufacpeajetransmprin, :ufacpeajetransmsec, :ufacfpmpoten, :ufacfpmenerg, :ufacfactgeneracion, :ufacfacttransmprin, :ufacfacttransmsec, :ufacfactdistrib, :ufacfactexcesopoten, :ufacfacturaciontotal, :ufacconsenergreacps, :ufacppmt, :ufacpemt, :ufacfactptoref, :ufacvadhp, :ufacvadfp, :ufaccargoelectrificacionrural, :ufacotrosconceptosnoafectoigv, :ufacotrosconceptosafectoigv, :emprcodi, :equicodi )
